alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 7:28PM EDT until September 07 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jefferson County in central New York... Southern Lewis County in central New York... Northeastern Oswego County in central New York... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 728 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Redfield, or 10 miles north of Camden, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Watertown, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Lowville, Pulaski, Adams, Dexter, Redfield, Glen Park, Selkirk Shores State Park, and Highmarket. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 34 and 47. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
